betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The Tank Extender is basically a one way valve as it is used to break up pipe segments into different networks.  It has 2 outputs, the Primary and the Secondary.  You can change the side the primary output by right clicking on the Greg Interface.  For the secondary, use your monkey wrench.  Greg's pipes spread out the fluid through all connected pipes of a single network evenly  This can cause issues when you have long large pipe networks especially when running machines with steam.  A Tank extender just needs a steel casing and a couple of steel pipes.

Tip:  Keep the fluid pipes to the closest bandwith that you produce or need.  Just stick a Tank Extender between the pipes coming off the boilers and just before the pipe going to the engine/turbine.  It will take the steam from each pipe coming from the biolers and force it into the single output pipe.

To complete this quest craft:
1 Tank Extender
